frontMatter.title: Decimal to binary
frontMatter.description: Write a programme to convert decimal number to binary

contentHtml:
Write a programme to convert decimal number to binary

Input : 8
Output : 1000

Input : 5
Ouput : 101
markdown:
## Write a programme to convert decimal number to binary

```txt
Input : 8
Output : 1000

Input : 5
Ouput : 101
```

---
